subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Centennial Field in Burlington, Vt. is older than Fenway Park and Wrigley Field, but without $7 million in renovations it will probably lose its minor-league team.
snippet: Centennial Field in Burlington, Vt. is older than Fenway Park and Wrigley Field, but without $7 million in renovations it will probably lose its minor-league team.
